messages.text: LGTM http://codereview.appspot.com/5477077/diff/1/doc/go1.html File doc/go1.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5477077/diff/1/doc/go1.html#newcode638 doc/go1.html:638: (a value, so the * is gone), which represents a moment of time; Maybe s/of/in/.
